title: Two Story Condo - Exposed Brick, 12ft Ceiling. Stunning!
posting_body: ['Available September 1', 'Showings now available', 'The condo', 'Inside features include: two stories, exposed brick, wood floors, 12 foot ceilings, 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, large windows providing lots of lights, updated appliances, all major appliances, in-unit washer and dryer, built-in bar and downstairs open office.', 'The master bedroom includes a built-in vanity and huge walk-in closet.', 'The second bedroom includes two closets.', 'Both bedrooms are noteworthy large rooms that are a hard to find combo in Denver.', "You will receive two parking passes for the building's lot.", 'There is plenty on-street parking for when family and friends visit.', 'There is also a communal outdoor patio for all residents to use!', 'This stunning building was originally a school, refurbished into condo units in 1996 and inducted into the Denver Historic Building Association in 2019.', 'The location', 'Prime location and walking distance to many hot spots:', '1.', 'Highland Square (32nd & Lowell): 3 blocks.', 'Highlights include: The Matador, Sushi Hai, Trattoria Stella, Salt & Ginger, Meat St. Station, Highlights Cork & Coffee, Fire on the Mountain, Sweet Cow, The Highlands Farmers market every Sunday in the Summer, Pure Barre, CorePower Yoga.', '2.', 'LoHi: 14 blocks/5 minute drive.', 'Highlights include: Linger, Little Man Ice Cream, Avanti, Ale House, Prost Brewing, Root Down, Highland Tavern, Highland Tap & Burger.', '3.', "Sloan's Lake: 7 minute drive, 4 mile run round trip.", 'Lease', 'Monthly Rent $3000', 'If interested please respond to this post and I will get in touch shortly to schedule a showing.', 'Thank you thank you!', 'Look forward to hearing from you!']
